desc: Students explore advanced strategies in writing essays. Three areas of emphasis are explored through the semester: the personal essay, lyrical prose and creative journalism. Many class sessions take the form of workshops in which students critique their peers' work. Prerequisite: English 251, 255, 257 or writing equivalent.
name: Adv Nonfict Wrtg Wksh
notes: Portfolio admission required for this course. Deadline Wednesday, March 22.
title: Advanced Creative Nonfiction
